verses.text: Ayic ix yab'an winhaj Sanbalat, winhaj Tobías, winhaj Gesem winh árabe yet' juntzanhxo eb' ayoch ajk'olal t'ayonh to toxo ix b'oq'ue muro chi', manhxalaj b'aj jacan, (wach'chom manto och spuertail),
ix schecancot jun schecab' eb' winh t'ayin yic tzul yalani to sco molb'ej co b'a yet' eb' winh t'a junok aldea t'a ak'lic yic Ono. Sna jun chi' eb' winh yic syak'an chukal eb' winh t'ayin.

Yuj chi' ix in checb'at jun in checab' yal t'a eb' winh, malaj in colanil, te vitz'an vaj t'a in munlajel niwan yelk'ochi, max yal-laj in b'ati. Tato tzin b'ati, tzam ochcan vaan jun munlajel tik, xin chib'ati.
Chanhel ix schec eb' winh ul alchaj jun lolonel chi' t'ayin, palta anheja' ichnhej ta' ix vutej in pacan t'a eb' winh.
Axo t'a yoelal, a val jun schecab' winhaj Sanbalat chi' ix scheccot ul yak' jun carta to jacan,

b'aj syal winh icha tik: Sb'ey specal t'a skal anima, icha pax chi' yalan winhaj Gesem to van e naan eyik'anel e b'ha t'a yol sk'ab' winh sreyal Persia, yuj chi' van e b'oanxiq'ue muro chi'. Scab' specal, tob' a ach ol ach och reyal.

Toxo ab' ix ak'och eb' schecab' Dios yic syalanel eb' t'a Jerusalén to rey achxo t'a Judá chi'. Ol yab' jun tik winhaj rey Artajerjes chi', yuj chi' cotanh, ol onh lolon ed'oc, xchi winh t'a jun scarta chi'.
Ixlajwi chi', ix in pacan t'a winh icha tik: Ha juntzanh lolonel tzal chi' manh yeloclaj, a ach tza naq'uei, xin chib'ati.
Ha eb' chi' syal eb' icha chi' yic tzonh xib'tan eb'. Am snaan eb' to ol chab'axq'ue co k'ool yic maxtzac yik'laj sb'a jun munlajel tik. Palta in lesalvi icha tik: Mamin ak' in tek'anil, xin chi.

Ixlajwi chi' ix in b'at t'a spat winhaj Semaías yuninal winhaj Delaía, yixchiquin winhaj Mehetabel. Ha winh chi' toxo ix smacoch sb'a winh t'a yol spat. Ix yalan winh t'ayin icha tik: Co k'ub'ej co b'ha t'a yol stemplo Dios, sco macan spuertail, yujto ha t'a jun ak'val tik sna eb' winh sjavi ul ach smilchamoc, xchi winh t'ayin.
Palta ix in tak'vi t'a winh icha tik: ¿Tom smoj tzin k'ub'ejel in b'a, tzin macanoch in b'ha t'a yol templo chi' yic tzin col in b'a? Manh ol in ochlaj t'a yol templo chi', xin chi t'a winh.

Ix nachajel vuuj to manhoc Dios tz'ak'an yal winh icha chi'. Ix yal juntzanh chi' winh yic tzin xib'tan winh yic tz'och in mul d'ha Dios, yujto a winhaj Sanbalat chi' yet' winhaj Tobías toxo ix yak' q'uen tumin eb' winh t'a winh.
Ix tupji winh yuj eb' winh yic tzin xib'tej winh, yic tz'och in mul yalan eb' winh, yic wach' te chuk in b'inaji, tz'el in q'uixvelal.

Yuj chi' ix in lesalvi icha tik: Ach in Diosal, tza nacoti yic tzak'anoch yaelal t'a yib'anh winhaj Sanbalat yet' winhaj Tobías chi' yuj tas ix sk'ulej. Anhejtona' tza nacot ix Noadías syaloch sb'a a checab'oc yet' juntzanhxo eb' syaloch sb'a a checab'oc snib'ej tzin xib'tej, xin chi t'a in lesal chi'.
Ix b'oelk'och muro chi', 52 k'ual ix yak' sb'oi. Ix b'oelk'ochi ayic 25 yoch uj Elul.

Ayic ix yab'an masanil eb' ayoch ajk'olal t'ayonh yet' masanil juntzanhxo nación ay t'a co lak'anil to ix b'o muro chi', ix xivq'ue eb'. Ix q'uixvipax eb', yujto ix nachajel yuj eb' to a jun munlajel chi' ix yik' sb'a yuj scolval co Diosal.
Ha t'a juntzanh k'ual chi' tzijtum carta ix stz'ib'ejb'at eb' winh vinac nivac yopisio aj Judá t'a winhaj Tobías chi', ix spacnhejxi winh.

Yujto tzijtum juntzanh eb' winh vinac nivac yopisio wach' yak'an yet' winh, yujto nhiab'il yaj winh t'a winhaj Secanías yuninal winhaj Ara. Axo pax winhaj Johanán yuninal winhaj Tobías chi', ix yik'laj sb'a winh yet' ix yisil winhaj Mesulam yuninal winhaj Berequías.

Yuj chi' wach' yak'an eb' winh nivac yopisio chi' yet' winhaj Tobías chi'. Syalan eb' winh t'ayin to te wach' winh, syalanxib'at eb' winh t'a winh masanil tas swal t'a eb' winh. Tzijtum carta ix stz'ib'ejcot winh yic tzin xib'tani.
